title: What's going on with PBE and Hextech Crafting
body: On the PBE server status, Riot disabled The store and hextech crafting while they were performing maintenance. Yet it's been more than a day and while the store is open, hextech crafting still hasn't been enabled. Does anyone know what's going on?

replies.body: It's likely that they're tested certain things on the back end of things regarding crafting or loot in general. It'd be worth the time to post this one the PBE boards and ask the folks who regularly deal with PBE.
